name: terra (pascalpetrino)
description:
The Terra are a race of plant-like creatures that exist within this subterranean micro-planetoid, isolated from the rest of the outside world…

...until this moment.

An unknown force is causing the terrain to rise.

-WASD keys to move

-Space to jump

-Esc to pause

-Works with Xbox 360 controller

Check out more of my work here! :)

terra is a short platformer I created during my time at the Buffalo Game Space, it is built upon the Corgi Engine by More Mountains.
